Generated Narrative: CodeSystem encounter-type

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/encounter-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
ADMS Annual diabetes mellitus screening
BD/BM-clin Bone drilling/bone marrow punction in clinic
CCS60 Infant colon screening - 60 minutes
OKI Outpatient Kenacort injection

name: EncounterType
title: Encounter type
description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.
